topic: Perovskite–silicon tandem cells, organic photovoltaics, and quantum-dot solar cells currently represent the forefront of next-generation solar technologies. Beyond these established platforms, which unconventional material classes or innovative device architectures—such as chalcogenide perovskites, 2D semiconductor heterostructures, or ferroelectric photovoltaic systems—offer the most unexpected promise for achieving breakthroughs in efficiency, stability, and scalability?
